title: Amazing Vitamin C Serum!
comment: I've been using FREYZA's Vitamin C serum for 3 months now and my skin has never looked better. The dark spots are fading and my complexion is so much brighter. Highly recommend!

title: Great moisturizer for sensitive skin
comment: The FREYZA hyaluronic acid moisturizer is perfect for my sensitive skin. No irritation and keeps my skin hydrated all day. Only wish it came in a larger size!

title: Retinol cream works wonders
comment: I was hesitant to try retinol but FREYZA's gentle retinol cream has been amazing. Fine lines are reducing and skin texture is improving. No harsh side effects either.

title: Decent cleanser but nothing special
comment: The FREYZA foaming cleanser does its job but I don't see any major difference compared to other cleansers. It's gentle and doesn't dry out my skin though.

title: Niacinamide serum is a game changer
comment: FREYZA's niacinamide serum has completely transformed my oily skin. Pores look smaller, oil production is controlled, and no more breakouts. Will definitely repurchase!

title: Sunscreen with great coverage
comment: Love this SPF 50 sunscreen from FREYZA. Doesn't leave white cast and works well under makeup. Protection seems good too. Just wish it was a bit more affordable.

title: Peptide cream didn't work for me
comment: I had high hopes for FREYZA's peptide anti-aging cream but after 2 months of use, I don't see any improvement. Also caused some minor breakouts. Might not be suitable for acne-prone skin.

title: Eye cream that actually works!
comment: Finally found an eye cream that reduces my dark circles! FREYZA's caffeine eye cream is lightweight, absorbs quickly, and I can see visible improvement after just 3 weeks.
